text.content:
Pointy End goes There

You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Wounded]{Wounded 1} or your wounded value increases by 1.

Melee

Tunnel Vision

For 3 rounds, you gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls for 3 rounds]{+1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls}, but you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed}.

Ranged

Head First!

You fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} until you wake up or the end of your next turn.

Unarmed

Wild Magic

Roll twice on the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.Rod of Wonder]{Rod of Wonder} table. You are the target of those effects.

Spell
